name: They turned up to be bad
name_original: They turned up to be bad
description:
A small puzzle game where you must turn everything up.

A level is completed when everything (except conveyor belts) is pointing up and all crates are on a target.

Mobile Friendly Version :
https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=c70400d26a376772f2cc029ebd6d7181
